Blog.post: omgosh i was talking to jenny and chris on the fone and explaining to chris that the hobbits are gay and i said "the hobbits are gay just get over it" and josh was like "would you shut the hell up im tired of hearing it if your not gonna shut up than go to ur fucking room" im like "excuse me but who lives here me so if ur tired of hearing it than go the fuck home!" stupid ass hole! noone understands how much i love him and why i do i dont even know why myself i cant understand how can anyone else but josh is just using me i know it so ... but i swear someone who will remain nameless said someday we'll get married i was like what she said we (me and josh) fight like a married couple! lmao well i hope not or ill haveto get "friendship divorce" lmao yeah right ok well i cant think about him right now im happy and dont wanna get in a different mood!!!!!!!! damn nevermind lol // just kidding

today i just had to be around josh didnt i? i just had to i wasnt even bothering him and i was talking to jenny and telling chris that the hobbits are gay when he was like shut the hell up go to ur room if ur gonna be like that i dont wanna hear it i was sooooo about to snap like.... who lives here again hmmm let me think oh yeah ME! but oh well tfb for him he is such an asshole i cant believe i love him i hate that and i aint gonna fall for it again!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Josh is my favorite person!!!!!!! i love him yet i hate him what can i do about that? today after making me think for sso long that he hated me he tells me that he likes me i hate it when he does this its pulling heart strings and i cant take it anymore i have to ask him out or tell him to stop tomarrow lmao i am so fucking dumb well thats me

I have no idea why i like him so much ppl who know me know who "he'' is and i have no idea why i like him so much i cant understand it and he always ignores me anyways so why should i care at all because he doesnt care about me and if he did he would talk to me at least once in a while!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! even if i wanted to find out why i like him i couldnt i like him to much to wanna think about it!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

(jen,camille,angie,nate,mike,nick...i think, and javontae) thanx you guys you are what keeps me going !
